opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

sentences.english: International Finance Forum (CIFF for short) will be held in Shanghai Pudong on …
sentences.chinese: CIFF第五届中国国际金融论坛。

sentences.english: They all curate exhibitions, publish books and catalogs , and organize conferences and symposia.
sentences.chinese: 他们策划展览，出版书籍和手册，组织会议和论坛。

sentences.english: Inter-party forum calls for global reform .
sentences.chinese: 中欧政党高层论坛呼唤全球改革。

sentences.english: Hope everybody to chongqing food web forums for his own family, often at home.
sentences.chinese: 希望大家把渝菜网论坛当成自己的家，常回家看看。

sentences.english: Just as rewarding as the play was the science forum held afterwards.
sentences.chinese: 像演出一样令人受益的是后来召开的科学论坛。

sentences.english: What's the View of Every Party about the Second Forum of Textile and Clothing Technology?
sentences.chinese: 第二届新疆纺织服装技术论坛举办，各方怎么看？

sentences.english: Jia welcomed King Gyanendra to the annual conference of the forum.
sentences.chinese: 贾庆林欢迎贾南德拉国王来华出席博鳌亚洲论坛年会。

sentences.english: UNESCO’s online forum on Inclusive Education is open.
sentences.chinese: 联合国教科文组织全纳教育网上论坛开始了。

sentences.english: The theme of the forum are China standard ship building contracts and maritime arbitration.
sentences.chinese: 本论坛以中国标准造船合同和海事仲裁为主题。

sentences.english: phpBB is one of the most popular software products for running online forums.
sentences.chinese: PhpBB是经营线上论坛的人们最喜欢的软件产品。

sentences.english: The problem is you to this professional forums spread what on?
sentences.chinese: 问题是你来这种专业论坛上撒什么泼？

sentences.english: Post any questions on the community forum.
sentences.chinese: 可以在社区论坛发表任何问题。

sentences.english: Old Stage1 never die, just fade away.
sentences.chinese: 论坛不会死去，强者的传说还会继续。

sentences.english: The toad was staring rather nastily.
sentences.chinese: 这是我在论坛上问的答案。
